name: MTLAccelerationStructureUserIDInstanceDescriptor
desc: A description of an instance in an instanced geometry acceleration structure, with the instance including a user identifier for the instance.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a default acceleration structure instance.

items.name: init(transformationMatrix: MTLPackedFloat4x3, options: MTLAccelerationStructureInstanceOptions, mask: UInt32, intersectionFunctionTableOffset: UInt32, accelerationStructureIndex: UInt32, userID: UInt32)
items.desc: Creates a new acceleration structure instance.

items.name: var accelerationStructureIndex: UInt32
items.desc: The index of the acceleration structure to use for the instance.

items.name: var transformationMatrix: MTLPackedFloat4x3
items.desc: The transform for placing and orienting the instance in the scene.

items.name: var intersectionFunctionTableOffset: UInt32
items.desc: An offset for determining which function in the intersection function table Metal calls when testing a ray against the instance.

items.name: var mask: UInt32
items.desc: A mask to use for the instance when testing a ray against the geometry.

items.name: var userID: UInt32
items.desc: The user identifier for the instance.
